## Practice Question
Which assumptions need to be true in order for the OLS estimator to be BLUE?

1. MLR1
2. MLR2
3. MLR3
4. MLR4
5. MLR5
6. All of the above

<div id="spoiler" style="display:none">
All of the above. We need each of the assumptions to hold in order for the Gauss-Markov theorem to hold.
